# HTML Table Example

The following table is dynamically generated from a CSV file using Python and Pandas.

```{python}
import pandas as pd

# Load the CSV file
csv_file = "data.csv"
df = pd.read_csv(csv_file)

# Display the data as an HTML table
df.to_html(index=False, classes='table table-bordered', border=0)
```
